message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.SI 

This paper belongs to the field of recommender systems, which is a subfield of machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper proposes a novel recommendation problem called exact-K recommendation, which involves combinatorial optimization and graph-based algorithms. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also involves graph-based algorithms, which suggests the possibility of cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) as potential sub-categories.
